description: This file defines the 'Summary' entity class for JPA/Hibernate ORM, mapping to the 'summaries' table in the database. It includes fields for id, user, date, content, and creation timestamp, with corresponding getters and setters.

classes.name: Summary
classes.description: JPA entity representing a summary record associated with a user, including summary date, content, and creation timestamp.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the summary.

methods.name: getSummaryDate
methods.description: Returns the date of the summary.

methods.name: setSummaryDate
methods.description: Sets the date of the summary.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the summary.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the summary.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the summary.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the summary.
